title: Need help identifying Dot Display Typeface

comments.content:
The sample is very small.  
You can look if there’s anything suitable in this list: [http://typophile.com/node/97219#comment-526532](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110119/http:/typophile.com/node/97219#comment-526532 "http://typophile.com/node/97219#comment-526532")
